holidays.title: National Coffee Day
holidays.description: Coffee is an integral part of American culture, like McDonald's, rock n' roll, and blue jeans.

holidays.title: National Starbucks Day
holidays.description: There are few places you can go in the world and not find a Starbucks.

holidays.title: CONFUCIUS DAY
holidays.description: Learn about the history of the great sage and how he is celebrated around the world!

holidays.title: International Day of Awareness of Food Loss and Waste
holidays.description: By raising awareness, let us all work together to reduce food loss and waste!

holidays.title: International Happy Goose Day
holidays.description: Warm up the oven, sharpen your knives and get ready to carve some succulent goose meat.

holidays.title: Michaelmas
holidays.description: Do you think angels are awesome? Get ready to celebrate a special day in their honor.

holidays.title: National Biscotti Day
holidays.description: Dry and crunchy; dipped or dunked, biscotti is enjoyed and celebrated in many ways.

holidays.title: National Carson Day
holidays.description: Despite its ancient origins, Carson is a name that stands the test of time.

holidays.title: National Police Remembrance Day
holidays.description: Be ready to celebrate this day right here with us by honoring all police officers.

holidays.title: National Silent Movie Day
holidays.description: Be ready to watch as many silent movies as possible on this special day!

holidays.title: VFW DAY
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the beloved heroes of America.

holidays.title: World Heart Day
holidays.description: Every year, over 17 million people die from heart disease.

holidays.title: World Maritime Day
holidays.description: Toss your hats in honor of the seafarers on World Maritime Day.

holidays.title: Andy Frisella’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this entrepreneur and podcaster, success in all he does is a way of life.

holidays.title: Bria Hamilton’s Birthday
holidays.description: This gal appeared on a trendy reality show and is now a social media star.

holidays.title: Ice Poseidon’s Birthday
holidays.description: This man is a social media personality known all across YouTube and Twitch.

holidays.title: Molly Eskam’s Birthday
holidays.description: This beautiful YouTube star has what it takes to make it big on social media.

holidays.title: Nicholas Galitzine’s Birthday
holidays.description: He landed major roles and made it big in just a few years since his debut.
